title: ArvamAi kUviDuvAi
sahitya:
ArvamAi kUviDuvAi en anbu mayamAna Anandak-kuyilE nI


anupallavi

  kAr mazhai veLLam pOl karuNai irangi varum kavalait-tuyarozhiyum kavirasam pozhiyum


caraNam    tan padamAghiya tAmarai malarum tAmasa ahankAram tAnE ularum
tunba naLLiravu pOi inba vasantamAghum shuddhOham shuddhOham shuddhOham enrE nI
